verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holiness unto the Lord, unto the King. Holiness unto Your name, I will sing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holiness unto Jesus, Holiness unto You, Lord, Holiness unto Jesus, Holiness unto You, Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love You, I love Your ways, I love Your name. I love You, and all my days, Iâ€™ll proclaim .{/lang-eng}
